name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
1.傳輸線
2.散射參數
3.微波主動元件
4.寬頻放大電路
5.低雜訊放大電路
6.功率放大器
7.高穩定振盪器
8.壓控振盪器
9.鎖相迴路
10.混波器
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Basic Concepts in RF Design
Week 3: Modulation and Wireless Standards
Week 4: Transmitter
Week 5: Receiver
Week 6: Low-Noise Amplifier
Week 7: Low-Noise Amplifier
Week 8: Midterm presentation I
Week 9: Midterm presentation II
Week 10: RF Switch
Week 11: Mixer
Week 12: Mixer
Week 13: Oscillator
Week 14: Oscillator
Week 15: Power Amplifier
Week 16: Power Amplifier
Week 17: Final presentation I
Week 18: Final presentation II
scorePolicy:
期中報告 50%
期末報告 50%
